              </td>
              <td width="719">
                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
      Company maintain its listing on the
NYSE;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr></table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
              <td style="WIDTH: 48px">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
              </td>
              <td style="WIDTH: 35px">
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;</font></font></div>
              </td>
              <td width="719">
                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
      Company's total net equity&#160;will not be less than $180.0 million;
      and</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr></table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
              <td style="WIDTH: 48px">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
              </td>
              <td style="WIDTH: 35px">
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;</font></font></div>
              </td>
              <td width="719">
                <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
      Company's minimum current ratio will be 1.15 with a minimum working
      capital need of $50.0 million.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr></table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Purchase of a
Floating Storage Facility</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;On October 14,
2009, the Company's subsidiary, Aegean Ostria Maritime Company, entered into a
memorandum of agreement with Aegean Gas Maritime Company, a company owned and
controlled by members of the family of Dimitris Melisanidis, the Company's
founder and Head of Corporate Development, for the purchase of a 20,000 dwt
double hull bunkering barge, the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Mediterranean</font>, used as a
floating storage facility.&#160;&#160;The purchase price of the vessel was $17.0
million.&#160;&#160;The purchase price of the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Mediterranean </font>was determined
by disinterested members of the Company's board of directors to be no greater
than it would have been with a third party on an arm's length basis at the time
it entered into the memorandum of agreement.&#160;&#160;The Company expects to
take delivery of the vessel before January 29, 2010.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">F-19</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">AEGEAN
MARINE PETROLEUM NETWORK INC.</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">NOTES
TO CONDENSED CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(UNAUDITED)</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Expressed
in thousands of U.S. dollars &#8211;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">except
share and per share data, unless otherwise stated)</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">14.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
Subsequent Events: (Continued)</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Purchase of
Jamaican Property.</font>&#160;&#160;On January 14, 2010, the Company entered
into an agreement with related companies owned and controlled by members of Mr.
Melisanidis' family, for the purchase of property in Jamaica, to be used as a
land-based storage facility.&#160;&#160;The purchase price for the property was
$9.8 million.&#160;&#160;The purchase price of the property was determined by
disinterested members of the Company's board of directors to be no greater than
it would have been with a third party on an arm's length basis at the time the
Company entered into the purchase agreement.&#160; The closing of the
acquisition is subject to a number of conditions precedent, including that the
Company shall have secured the necessary financing.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Vessel Employment
Agreements.</font>&#160;&#160;On October 26, 2009, the Company entered into
agreements with an unaffiliated third party for the employment of its vessels,
the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Aegean III</font>, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Aegean VIII</font>, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Aegean XII</font>, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Aegean Daisy</font>, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Aegean Rose</font>, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Aegean B</font>reeze and <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Aegean Tiffany</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Delivery of the
Newbuildings.</font>&#160;&#160;On October 15, 2009, the Company took delivery
of the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Kefalonia</font>, a
6,272 dwt double hull bunkering tanker newbuilding from the Qingdao Hyundai
Shipyard in China ("Qingdao Hyundai").&#160;&#160;The <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Kefalonia</font> is deployed in the
Company's new service center in Trinidad and Tobago.&#160;&#160;On November 20,
2009, the Company took delivery of the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Paxoi</font>, a 5,500 dwt double
hull bunkering tanker newbuilding from Qingdao Hyundai.&#160;&#160;The Company
deployed the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Paxoi</font> to
its United Kingdom service center.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Memorandum of
Agreement.</font>&#160;&#160;On November 18, 2009, the Company signed a
memorandum of agreement with a third-party purchaser for the sale of the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Aegean IX</font>, a vessel the
Company used as a floating storage facility in Jamaica.&#160;&#160;The purchase
price of the vessel was $400.&#160; The vessel was delivered on December 8,
2009.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
